title: My First Post
author: John Doe
content: This is the content of my very first blog post. Welcome to my new blog! We will be discussing various topics related to web development.

title: Learning Next.js App Router
author: Jane Smith
content: The Next.js App Router is a powerful new feature. It introduces server components, layouts, and a new way of thinking about routing. This post will explore the basics.

title: Styling in Next.js
author: John Doe
content: There are many ways to style a Next.js application, from CSS Modules to Tailwind CSS and styled-components. Let's take a look at the pros and cons of each approach.
